songs.title: Play It Safe
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: brandUn DeShay]
Ahem, if I can have your attention for a moment
But I finally started living in the moment
If I offer you my hand and you take it, would you fold it?
Not much of a royal flush, but the least you could do was hold it
I really, really like you, I just don't want you to know it
Got the tongue of an idiot and writing of a poet
No wind for this relationship, so I resort to rowing
If the slipper doesn't fit then I guess I have to grow in…to it
Huh

[Pre-Hook: brandUn DeShay]
But every day, she’s seen with someone else
And every night, she kisses someone new

[Hook: brandUn DeShay]
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
Just how I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
The way I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
Just how I feel, when I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
The way I feel, I can't let you go

[Verse 2: brandUn DeShay]
I hope that what we have here is mutual
Even had a psychic read my palm just to show me what the future holds
I hope that in the future, I'll be holding you, no future hoes
You a know-it-all but there's a lot of thing that you should know
Now I opened up the floors, so I think that you should go
First, then tell me what's the deal like Howie Mandel
But how a man feels is hard to confess
Like sex I'ma have to cum correct, I guess
Huh

[Pre-Hook: brandUn DeShay]
But every day, she’s seen with someone else
And every night, she kisses someone new

[Hook: brandUn DeShay]
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
Just how I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
The way I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
Just how I feel, when I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
The way I feel, I can't let you go

[Verse 3: brandUn DeShay]
I know my chances are slim like Ethiopian kids
And you showed me love back, but I'm hoping you willing
I'm hoping I'm wrong and this could be a tangible dream
‘Cause baby, I can be the man of your dreams
But the difference is I'm really here
To never know what could've been is the only thing that I really fear
Most of these people got problems ‘cause they doing it wrong
So we got to get it right just to prove that it's wrong
You know?
So…

[Pre-Hook: brandUn DeShay]
But every day, she’s seen with someone else
And every night, she kisses someone new

[Hook: brandUn DeShay]
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
Just how I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
The way I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
Just how I feel, when I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
The way I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
Just how I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
The way I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
Just how I feel, I can't let you go
I'm hoping you say yes if I let you know
The way I feel, I can't let you go
